description: Kriis hired a handyman named Fox to renovate his house. He wanted a wall knocked down to open up two a joining rooms. Fox was confused and knocked down the wrong wall. When Kriis realized what had happened he was furious. He was just about to fire Fox when Fox suggested he would do ANYTHING in order not to be fired. And Kriis knew just the job he could do. Kriis said fuck me or get fired and Fox jumped right in Kriis's ass.
title: Touch Of A Man
